original: ANDERSSON, Emmanuel Albin, Direktör, Göteborg, f Jörlanda, Gbgs o Bohus l, 31/3 78. Eft avslut skolstud 97 prakt i elektr aff o mek verkst Gbg. Etabl eg elektr fma o tillverkn av cyklar Bröd Anderssons Veloci-pedaff 03, upptog försäljn av radioapparater 23, start tillverkn av radioapp Kungsradio 32 o ändr fmanamnet t Bröd Anderssons Velociped- & Radiofabr (AB 41).
translated: ANDERSSON, Emmanuel Albin, Director, Gothenburg, born in Jörlanda, Gothenburg and Bohus County, March 31, 1878. Completed school studies in 1897 and gained practical experience in electrical affairs and mechanical workshops in Gothenburg. Established my own electrical company and bicycle manufacturing business, Bröd Anderssons Veloci-pedaff, in 1903, started selling radio equipment in 1923, began radio production under the brand Kungsradio in 1932, and changed the company's name to Bröd Anderssons Velociped- & Radiofabr (AB 41).

additionalProperty.name: Practical Experience
additionalProperty.value: Electrical affairs and mechanical workshops in Gothenburg

career.occupational_title: Practical experience in electrical affairs and mechanical workshops
Founder and owner of electrical company and bicycle manufacturing business
Changed company name to Bröd Anderssons Velociped- & Radiofabr (AB 41)
